Package ca.mcgill.splendorclient.gui.gameboard

Class CardColumnView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
ca.mcgill.splendorclient.gui.gameboard.CardColumnView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, Observer, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class CardColumnView extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements Observer, Observable
Represents the view of the user's inventory. Observes UserInventory for notification of valid purchase and associated card Observed by Deck for notification of dealing new card
